casebody.data:
IN RE: Bart F. MCCLAIN 165P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 8, 2019 Bart F. McClain, for McClain, Bart F. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of May 2019 by Petitioner for Review of Emergency Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of May 2019."
